description: now: the time this file was generated, in seconds since Jan 1 1970 00:00:00 GMT (the Unix epoch)
name: timestamp

description: aircraft.hex: the 24-bit ICAO identifier of the aircraft, as 6 hex digits. The identifier may start with '~', this means that the address is a non-ICAO address (e.g. from TIS-B).
name: hex

description: aircraft.lat: aircraft latitude in decimal degrees
name: lat

description: aircraft.lon: aircraft longitude in decimal degrees
name: lon

description: aircraft.nucp: the NUCp (navigational uncertainty category) reported for the position
name: nucp

description: aircraft.seen_pos: how long ago (in seconds before now) the position was last updated
name: seen_pos

description: aircraft.altitude: the aircraft altitude in feet, or ground if it is reporting it is on the ground
name: altitude

description: aircraft.track: true track over ground in degrees (0-359)
name: track

description: aircraft.speed: reported speed in kt. This is usually speed over ground, but might be IAS - you can't tell the difference here, sorry!
name: speed

description: aircraft.messages: total number of Mode S messages received from this aircraft
name: messages

description: aircraft.seen: how long ago (in seconds before now) a message was last received from this aircraft
name: seen

description: aircraft.rssi: recent average RSSI (signal power), in dbFS; this will always be negative.
name: rssi

description: Time stamp when this record was inserted on the table
name: created_at
